mapper.select: SELECT CAST(GAME_NO AS INT) AS GAME_NO, TO_CHAR(GAME_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GAME_DATE, GAME_TIME, TEAM_A, TEAM_B, GAME_FIELD FROM GAME WHERE TO_CHAR(GAME_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_MEETING_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MEETING ( MEETING_NO, GAME_NO, MEETING_TITLE, MEETING_TEAM_NAME, MEETING_MAX_PEOPLE, MEETING_TIME, MEETING_PLACE, MEETING_CONTENT, MEETING_DATE,MEMBER_ID, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{meetingNo}, #{gameNo}, #{meetingTitle}, #{meetingTeamName}, #{meetingMaxPeople}, #{meetingTime}, #{meetingPlace}, #{meetingContent}, #{meetingDate},#{memberId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )

SELECT SEQ_MEETING_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MEETING_FILE ( MEETING_FILE_NO, MEETING_NO, FILE_NAME, FILE_RENAME, FILE_PATH, WEB_PATH, FILE_ORDER, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{meetingFileNo}, #{meetingNo}, #{fileName}, #{fileRename}, #{filePath}, #{webPath}, #{fileOrder}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEETING_NO, M.GAME_NO, M.MEETING_TITLE, M.MEETING_TEAM_NAME, M.MEETING_MAX_PEOPLE, M.MEETING_TIME, M.MEETING_PLACE, M.MEETING_CONTENT, M.MEMBER_ID, M.REG_DATE FROM MEETING M JOIN GAME G ON M.GAME_NO = G.GAME_NO WHERE G.GAME_DATE = #{date}
SELECT GAME_NO, TO_CHAR(GAME_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GAME_DATE, GAME_TIME, TEAM_A, TEAM_B, GAME_FIELD FROM GAME WHERE GAME_NO = #{gameNo}

SELECT MEETING_NO, GAME_NO, MEETING_TITLE, MEETING_TEAM_NAME, MEETING_MAX_PEOPLE, MEETING_TIME, MEETING_PLACE, MEETING_CONTENT, MEETING_DATE, MEMBER_ID, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE FROM MEETING WHERE MEETING_NO = #{meetingNo}
SELECT MEETING_FILE_NO, MEETING_NO, FILE_NAME, FILE_RENAME, FILE_PATH, WEB_PATH, FILE_ORDER, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE FROM MEETING_FILE WHERE MEETING_NO = #{meetingNo}

SELECT a.meeting_attend_no, a.meeting_no, a.member_id, a.meeting_attend_yn, a.reg_date, a.update_date, m.member_nickname as memberNickname FROM meeting_attend a JOIN member m ON a.member_id = m.member_id WHERE a.meeting_no = #{meetingNo} ORDER BY a.reg_date ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEETING_ATTEND WHERE MEETING_NO = #{meetingNo} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
